itunes:title: Bonus Easter Episode with Jennie Allen!
title: Bonus Easter Episode with Jennie Allen!
description:
Join Raechel, Amanda, and guest Jennie Allen for a bonus episode for Resurrection Sunday. Together they read the account of the resurrection and reflect on why God’s victory over death means new life for those who believe. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Day 49 of the She Reads Truth Lent 2022: Come to Life reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Lent 2022: Come to Life collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/bonus-easter-episode-with-jennie-allen
